quote_last: and the traffic was now flowing smoothly. He walked over to the officer coordinating the shoot for the city’s motion picture and television office.
title: Honor Among Thieves
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: He walked quickly downstairs and headed for reception, where he tried a different ploy.
title: A Prisoner of Birth
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first:
I grab a pen and the pad of paper by the phone and start scribbling a list for the day. I have an image of myself moving smoothly from task to task, brush in one hand, duster in the other, bringing order to everything. Like Mary Poppins.
9:30-
title: The Undomestic Goddess
author: Sophie Kinsella

quote_last: Oh God, Oh God. Maybe he’s fallen in love in New York and stayed there.
title: Bridget Jones's Diary
author: Helen Fielding
